name: Reversible
description:
Play as a friendly patchwork ghost who's trying to escape an evil mansion!
This ghost has the power to turn himself inside-out and view the spirit world to help him manoeuvre his way around.

Controls: 
WASD - move
E - Interact
Left-Shift - Turn Inside-Out

Thanks to Curdle Games for hosting this game jam with the theme: Inside-out! 

All code and assets were created by me (Lewis Nicholson) in a 5 day time-span.
